author: mpricehip2save
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Little Tikes Basketball Hoop Set Only $17.49 Shipped (Regularly $49.99)
text:
Kohl’s Cardholders! Through March 8th, head over to Kohls.com where Kohl’s Cardholders can get this Little Tikes Easy Score Basketball Hoop Set for only $17.49 shipped (regularly $49.99) – just use promo codes MARCH30 for 30% off your purchase and FREE4MAR to score free shipping on ANY size order!
This Little Tikes set includes an adjustable hoop that measures between 2 and 4 feet, and a junior sized soft ball. This set would be great for ages 18 month to 5 years.
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? Save an extra 15% off a $100+ purchase with code CATCH15OFF at checkout (expires 12/31/17). Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $5.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available near you.

And starting today and through March 12th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from March 13th-26th.
